code:
%%{init: {
  "theme": "base",
  "flowchart": { "curve": "basis", "nodeSpacing": 60, "rankSpacing": 85, "padding": 10 },
  "themeVariables": {
    "fontFamily": "Inter, Arial, sans-serif",
    "fontSize": "14px",
    "lineColor": "#333333",
    "textColor": "#111111"
  }
}}%%

flowchart TB
 subgraph C["Commonwealth responsibility (revenue & policy levers)"]
    direction TB
        Tax["Tax / Revenue"]
        MBS["Medicare (MBS)"]
        GP["General practice policy"]
        AgedCare["Aged care (places, pricing, market settings)"]
        NDIS["NDIS (supports, plans, providers)"]
  end
 subgraph F["Interface friction (cost shifting / system gaps)"]
    direction TB
        Gap1["Primary care access gap"]
        Gap2["Aged care capacity constraint"]
        Gap3["NDIS supports delay / mismatch"]
        ED_Pres["ED presentations (avoidable demand)"]
        Bed_Occ["Bed occupancy pressure (long-stay)"]
  end
 subgraph S["State responsibility (operational delivery & risk)"]
    direction TB
        Hosp_Budget["State hospital budgets"]
        ED["Emergency Department"]
        Wards["Inpatient wards"]
        Amb["Ambulance / ramping"]
  end
    Tax -- NHRA grants (capped / constrained growth) --> Hosp_Budget
    MBS -. service availability & affordability .-> Gap1
    GP -. workforce / access .-> Gap1
    AgedCare -. capacity / eligibility .-> Gap2
    NDIS -. supports timing & fit .-> Gap3
    Gap1 -- shift --> ED_Pres
    Gap2 -- shift --> Bed_Occ
    Gap3 -- shift --> Bed_Occ
    ED_Pres -- demand surge --> ED
    Bed_Occ -- delayed discharge --> Wards
    ED -- ambulance holding --> Amb

     Tax:::cth
     MBS:::cth
     GP:::cth
     AgedCare:::cth
     NDIS:::cth
     Gap1:::risk
     Gap2:::risk
     Gap3:::risk
     ED_Pres:::risk
     Bed_Occ:::risk
     Hosp_Budget:::state
     ED:::state
     Wards:::state
     Amb:::state
    classDef cth fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#01579b,stroke-width:2px,color:#111
    classDef state fill:#ffebee,stroke:#b71c1c,stroke-width:2px,color:#111
    classDef risk fill:#FFE8E8,stroke:#e65100,stroke-width:2px,stroke-dasharray: 6 4,color:#111
